mapper.sql: ID, Train_team_no, Create_time, Modify_time, Title, Title_flag, Phone, Head_image, Brand_content, Trait, Free_classes, Free_parking, City_id, Address, Longitude, Latitude, Venue_number, Teach_class, Level, Level_time, Min_amount, Ball_hour1, Ball_hour2, Ball_hour3, Type_flag, Train_coach_id
mapper.select: SELECT tt.*,ABS(tt.`Longitude` - #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE}) + ABS(tt.`Latitude` - #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}) lnglat FROM TrainTeam tt ORDER BY lnglat ASC
SELECT tt.* FROM TrainTeam tt INNER JOIN TrainCoach tc ON tt.`ID` = tc.`Train_team_id` WHERE tc.`ID` = #{coachid}
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM TrainTeamVenue where Train_team_id = #{id}

SELECT MIN(tco.`Amount`) FROM (SELECT tc.`ID` tcID FROM TrainTeam tt INNER JOIN TrainCoach tc ON tt.`ID` = tc.`Train_team_id` WHERE tt.`ID` = #{trainTeamId}) ttc INNER JOIN `TrainCourse` tco ON ttc.tcID = tco.Train_coach_id

SELECT IFNULL(MIN(tco.`Amount`),0) FROM (SELECT tc.`ID` tcID FROM ( SELECT tte.id FROM TrainTeam tte LEFT JOIN TrainTeamVenue ttv ON tte.`ID` = ttv.`Train_team_id` WHERE ttv.`Train_venue_id` = #{venueid}) tt INNER JOIN TrainCoach tc ON tt.`ID` = tc.`Train_team_id` ) ttc INNER JOIN `TrainCourse` tco ON ttc.tcID = tco.Train_coach_id

SELECT * FROM TrainTeam tt LEFT JOIN City c ON tt.`City_id` = c.`ID`
AND c.`City` LIKE concat('%',concat('${keyword}','%'))
AND tt.Title LIKE concat('%',concat('${keyword}','%'))
ORDER BY Modify_time DESC
SELECT * FROM TrainTeam tt INNER JOIN TrainTeamCollect ttc ON tt.`ID` = ttc.`Train_team_id` WHERE ttc.`Member_id` = #{id}

SELECT * FROM TrainTeam WHERE `Longitude` > #{begLng} AND `Longitude` < #{endLng} AND `Latitude` > #{begLat} AND `Latitude` < #{endLat}
AND Teach_class like "%网球%"
AND Teach_class like "%足球%"
AND Teach_class like "%羽毛球%"
AND Type_flag = 1

SELECT tt.* FROM TrainTeam tt INNER JOIN TrainTeamCoach ttc ON tt.`ID` = ttc.`Train_team_id` INNER JOIN TrainCoach tc ON tc.`ID` = ttc.`Train_coach_id` WHERE tc.`Member_id` = #{memberid} AND ttc.`Manager` = #{manager}
mapper.insert: insert into TrainTeam (ID, Train_team_no, Create_time, Modify_time, Title, Title_flag, Phone, Head_image, Brand_content, Trait, Free_classes, Free_parking, City_id, Address, Longitude, Latitude, Venue_number, Teach_class, Level, Level_time, Min_amount, Ball_hour1, Ball_hour2, Ball_hour3, Type_flag, Train_coach_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{trainTeamNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titleFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freeClasses,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{freeParking,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{venueNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teachClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{levelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{minAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ballHour1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ballHour2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ballHour3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trainCoachId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update TrainTeam
Train_team_no = #{trainTeamNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Title_flag = #{titleFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Head_image = #{headImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Brand_content = #{brandContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Trait = #{trait,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Free_classes = #{freeClasses,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Free_parking = #{freeParking,jdbcType=INTEGER},
City_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Venue_number = #{venueNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Teach_class = #{teachClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Level_time = #{levelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Min_amount = #{minAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Ball_hour1 = #{ballHour1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Ball_hour2 = #{ballHour2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Ball_hour3 = #{ballHour3,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Type_flag = #{typeFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Train_coach_id = #{trainCoachId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update TrainTeam set Train_team_no = #{trainTeamNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Title_flag = #{titleFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Head_image = #{headImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Brand_content = #{brandContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Trait = #{trait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Free_classes = #{freeClasses,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Free_parking = #{freeParking,jdbcType=INTEGER}, City_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Venue_number = #{venueNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Teach_class = #{teachClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Level_time = #{levelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Min_amount = #{minAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Ball_hour1 = #{ballHour1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Ball_hour2 = #{ballHour2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Ball_hour3 = #{ballHour3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Type_flag = #{typeFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Train_coach_id = #{trainCoachId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
